idea-plugin.name: DBCompare
idea-plugin.description:
比较数据库和对象 1 可以根据表自动生成entity、dao、service class 2 也可以根据entity一键生成表，可以比较表和entity 3 并一键将差异的字段写入数据库或者entity中. 支持数据库:mariaDB/mysql/oracle. 支持语言:java/kotlin
Compare databases and objects 1 can automatically generate entity, dao, service class according to the table 2 You can also generate a table according to the entity with one key, and you can compare the table and the entity 3 and write the difference fields into the database or entity with one click. Supported database: mariaDB/mysql/oracle. Supported language: java/kotlin
